text.section: Each private therapeutic group home shall make and periodically update a written plan of treatment for each individual in the home, in accordance with rules and regulations that the Director adopts.

section.section: The Director shall adopt appropriate rules and regulations to carry out the intent of this section in accordance with current professional practices.

The rules and regulations shall include:
A description of the nature and content of plans of treatment; and
Appropriate time periods for the development, implementation, and review of each plan.
